description: Lists the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center applications.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplications
nested_items.description: The list of Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center applications.

nested_items.name: IdcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the IAM Identity Center instance that Redshift integrates with.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the Redshift application in IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Redshift application that integrates with IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: IdentityNamespace
nested_items.description: The identity namespace for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It determines which managed application verifies the connection token.

nested_items.name: IdcDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It appears on the console.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It has the required permissions to be assumed and invoke the IDC Identity Center API.

nested_items.name: IdcManagedApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: IdcOnboardStatus
nested_items.description: The onboarding status for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedTokenIssuerList
nested_items.description: The authorized token issuer list for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedAudiencesList
nested_items.description: The list of audiences for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ServiceIntegrations
nested_items.description: A list of service integrations for the Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: LakeFormation
nested_items.description: A list of scopes set up for Lake Formation integration.

nested_items.name: LakeFormationQuery
nested_items.description: The Lake Formation scope.

nested_items.name: Authorization
nested_items.description: Determines whether the query scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: S3AccessGrants
nested_items.description: A list of scopes set up for S3 Access Grants integration.

nested_items.name: ReadWriteAccess
nested_items.description: The S3 Access Grants scope.

nested_items.name: Authorization
nested_items.description: Determines whether the read/write scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A value that indicates the starting point for the next set of response records in a subsequent request. If a value is returned in a response, you can retrieve the next set of records by providing this returned marker value in the Marker parameter and retrying the command. If the Marker field is empty, all response records have been retrieved for the request.
